strings.description: We help grow and improve OpenStreetMap in the United States.
strings.extendedDescription: We support OpenStreetMap by holding annual conferences, providing community resources, building partnerships, and by spreading the word. Join OpenStreetMap US here: {signupUrl}

events.name: Mapping USA 2022
events.description: Join us for a free virtual conference in celebration of the Wiki and OpenStreetMap communities across North America!
